searchpp.view.searchSidebar.description: On the (`Find`) command (Ctrl+F), opens the sidebar's search view filtered to the current editor.

default.name: Project
default.description: Follows user settings for ignoring globals and locals to search the active directory.

default.name: Current Document
default.description: Searches the document of the last focused editor tab.

searchpp.filters.description: An array of default and custom filters that populate the drop-down menu in the sidebar's search view.

default.name: Always
default.description: Every unique filter created by searching via the (`Find`) action in the sidebar Explorer view will be added to the custom user filters.

default.name: Smart
default.description: Filters of only one element will be ignored. Unique filters with multiple elements will be added to the custom user filters.

searchpp.explorer.keepFilters.description: Stores the filter for the selected folders and files when using the (`Find`) action in the sidebar's explorer view.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
